definition: gunman/sharpshooter/sb who takes an exam for sb else/sb who produces a piece of work for sb else to pass off as their own
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The gunman notched up five victims on the handle of his gun.
sentences.chinese: 槍手在自己的槍柄上刻上5個受害者的記號。

sentences.english: And the Gunners will fund it with their windfall for ex-skipper Patrick…
sentences.chinese: 槍手將會用賣出前隊長的前來收購他。

sentences.english: Riflemen at the embankment also had cut holes through which they could aim and fire.
sentences.chinese: 堤岸上來復槍手開好了瞄準射擊的射孔。

sentences.english: He aimed with accuracy of a sharpshooter .
sentences.chinese: 他似神槍手你的精度瞄準。
近衛軍火槍手能持續射擊了。

sentences.english: She had him cast in her Western movie The Quick and the Dead.
sentences.chinese: 她請他在她的西部片《致命快槍手》中扮演角色。

sentences.english: But official statements now refer to "an armed group" of professional marksmen .
sentences.chinese: 但是現在官方聲明指“的武裝集團”的專業神槍手。

sentences.english: Gunners on Humvees have high casualty rates.
sentences.chinese: 悍馬炮塔上的槍手傷亡率一直很高。

sentences.english: The Gunners manager has openly admitted his frustration with Domenech's decision making.
sentences.chinese: 這位槍手主帥公開承認他曾對多梅內克決定感到不滿。

sentences.english: The gunman saw this on television, and became agitated himself.
sentences.chinese: 槍手在電視上看到這一點，也是焦躁不安。

sentences.english: That limited the rate of fire would very limited even with rotation.
sentences.chinese: 即使槍手們輪番上陣，所能節省的時間也非常有限。

sentences.english: Former Arsenal defender Silvinho has confirmed his retirement from professional football.
sentences.chinese: 前槍手後衛西爾維尼奧證實自己已經退役。

sentences.english: I came here with the intention of requesting the uniform of a Musketeer.
sentences.chinese: 我來此的目的是想請您賜予我一件火槍手軍服。

sentences.english: Choose turning the sports section of the observer into a gunners fanzine.
sentences.chinese: 選擇把“觀察者”的體育部分變爲槍手的球迷雜誌。

sentences.english: A machine gunner and rifleman cover the cave entrance.
sentences.chinese: 機槍手和步槍手瞄準了洞穴入口。

sentences.english: Let's not fall victim to the Oklahoma sharpshooter.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們不要成爲俄克拉荷馬州的神槍手。

definition: to open fire/to shoot a gun
to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
member of the same party/member of the same group/accomplice
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
